document_data.name: Invadiah
document_data.mainbody: '''Invadiah''' was the most powerful [[erinyes]] in the [[Nine Hells]] and was the leader of [[Glasya]]'s elite erinyes guard, the [[Pradixikai]].{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|6068}}
document_data.Relations: She had fifty-eight erinyes daughters{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|2025}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1478}}, Invadiah sought to carry out Glasya's plot to trick [[Asmodeus]] into fighting the [[Abolethic Sovereignty]]. Unfortunately for her, the plot unraveled, primarily due to betrayal by the [[succubus]] [[Rohini]]. As punishment for her failure, Invadiah was "demoted" to succubus herself and her holdings given to her daughter [[Sairch√©]].{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|7381}}
